content: For Walgreens Balance Rewards, I currently have 10,000 points, which is equivalent to $10 worth of rewards. I earn 10 points for every dollar I spend, and I can redeem them in increments of 5,000 points for $5 off a purchase. Speaking of which, I recently redeemed 5,000 points to get $5 off my purchase of shampoo and conditioner.
